data.summary: Step Types & Enhanced Plan Management feature complete

commits.message: feat: Add step types system and enhanced plan management
docs: Update README with step types and enhanced plan management features

key_features: 10 step type classifications (standard, analysis, validation, user_validation, confirmation, complex, critical, build, fix, refactor)
Step type metadata with auto_completable and blocking properties
Insert/delete step actions with automatic re-indexing
Order validation warnings for out-of-sequence completions
Plan delete action with safety confirmation
Plan consolidate action for merging consecutive steps
